ygData.subject: Re: A question regarding quests...
ygData.msgSnippet: This is a very good answer to the problem of under-rewarded quests.  I have never done a quest, because the rewards were so light.  My daughter has done some
ygData.messageBody:
This is a very good answer to the problem of "under-rewarded" quests. I have
never done a quest, because the rewards were so light. My daughter has done
some and I find she knows much more about Norrath than I do. I think I should
be looking at the experience rather than my bank balance. Gee, just like real
life!

Ramalama - 7th Level Ranger, Mithanial Marr


>Many people who quest do it simply for the knowledge that they gain. The
>pride of completing a job that, perhaps, no one else has completed yet.
>There are more things in EQ than leveling and gaining items and money.
>In Light,

>Mystyrain Silverlining

------------------------------------------------------------------------
